title: Patcher won't open at all
body:
I've been experiencing a certain problem over the last few days. The patcher absolutely refuses to open, no matter how I try to open it. I've tried the following:
* Uninstall / reinstall
* run as administrator
* Uninstall Avast
*Troubleshoot
*Old solutions posted in 2013

I don't know what else to try, so help is very much appreciated! 

P.S. The error is "HTTP error, firewall bla bla bla" idk the exact text because it doesn't pop up at all anymore

replies.body: The exact pop up message could help a lot here, but based on what you have explained here it seems that you're having a connection issue.  A setting on your OS or network is preventing the patcher from connecting to the server.   I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  More specifically, you can use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings to establish a connection.  Hope that helps!

This is great, thanks for the clarification!  This error usually suggests an issue with your settings that's blocking the game from loading.  Go through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
